pages.text: $(key)Spell Power$() is a mage's core attribute — it directly determines a spell's $(bold)damage$() and $(bold)effects$().$(br2)By default, $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$() and $(mage/essence#el)Enlightening Essence$() obtained from loot will belong to the $(mage/school)spell school$() in which you have the highest $(key)Spell Power$() — your $(bold)"specialized"$() school.
